title: 3 and Out - Tua + Pickett Problems, Mahomes/Reid Clinic, Rodgers Pass
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Tua + Pickett Problems, Mahomes/Reid Clinic, Rodgers Pass
description:
John reacts to the Dolphins SNF win over the Steelers, why it was a mistake for the Steelers to take Kenny Pickett, why he’s worried about Tua over the long term. He also discusses Andy Reid’s play calling clinic against the Niners, Pete Carroll’s post-Russ redemption, and why he’s not crushing Aaron Rodgers for the Packers terrible start.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content. It's always FanDuel for the best wagering action! #Volume #herd
